Html:
Hi there,

I am having trouble adding the RTE dll to my website.

I have added a reference to the RichTextEditor.dll in my bin folder and I tried to add the control to one of my pages, but the page wouldn't load afterwards.

I added the assembly reference at the top of the page as well. Not sure what to do now.

Can anyone help me set this up?
How did you get the dll? I don;t see a link to download it.
I got the dll from downloading the latest version on the Source Code page and compiling it. Is there a release version I can download?

Does anyone know how to "compile" the downloaded files into a .dll file? When I downloaded the files there were just example folders with some ASP.NET files and that was about it.

Any help would be appreciated.

Many thanks.

M.
